query: SELECT * FROM membershipTiers ORDER BY displayOrder;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Mhpd8nk54dx6w3.root --database e9RJaE3TPmF4zsnh5FSQoP --execute SELECT * FROM membershipTiers ORDER BY displayOrder;

rows.name: Free
rows.features: ["Access to public Facebook group","Weekly tips and challenges","10 free prompts","Tool comparison guides","Monthly live Q&A (100+ attendees)"]

rows.name: Access Pass
rows.features: ["Full access to tools & prompts library (lifetime)","Complete wiki & resource hub","Private community access","Monthly newsletter","No workshops or recordings"]

rows.name: Workshop
rows.features: ["1 workshop access + recording","Full access to tools & prompts library (lifetime)","Complete wiki & resource hub","Private community access"]

rows.name: Starter
rows.features: ["2 workshops per month","Monthly live training","Full access to tools & prompts library (lifetime)","Community access","Priority support"]

rows.name: Lite
rows.features: ["4 workshops per month","Monthly live training","Workshop recordings access","Full access to tools & prompts library (lifetime)","1-hour 1-on-1 monthly","Custom workflows","Tool stack audit"]

rows.name: Pro
rows.features: ["Unlimited workshops per month","Monthly live training","Workshop recordings access","Full access to tools & prompts library (lifetime)","2 hours strategy monthly","Security checklists","Priority support","Custom integrations"]

rows.name: Elite
rows.features: ["Everything in Pro Academy","Weekly 1-on-1 coaching (60 min/month)","Custom automation builds (5 hours/month)","Direct WhatsApp access to Huxley","Quarterly strategy reviews with ROI tracking","Access to Replit Advanced Coding Lab (future)","Exclusive mastermind group (10-15 members)","Speaking/content collaboration opportunities","Lifetime access to all future courses"]

rows.name: Enterprise
rows.features: ["Everything in Pro","Compliance audits","Full systems assessment","Custom integrations","Dedicated support","Contact us for pricing"]
